column5: Mike, you are killin my wallet !!!!! Facebook,.......Your videos,........posts on Walleye Central,........"Orange and copper spoons",.....everywhere I look !!!!!! That's it,....I'm done watching your videos and reading your posts,....cuz every time I do,....I run (that's a lie,..I'm fat, so I walk) out and buy whatever you say is great!!!!! OK,....that's probably a lie too,....there's NO way I could stop watching your videos! So yea,.....I bought 3 spoons tonight after hearing all about your fingernail polish post on FB. Seems to me that they should GIVE you a kickback when people buy these spoons !! OK,....all kidding aside,...love reading and watching all your videos,...keep up the great work!! PS,....after purchasing these spoons,...they gave me a bottle of orange fingernail polish,...strange eh ??!! Chuck bearfvr13
Chuck that was fantastically funny. Thank you sir!!
If it was only the **** tackle. Its the trips he keeps taking. UGH!
